title: The Casual Collection v1.0
description:
The Casual Collection is my mission to create a collection of all the <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Casual_games>casual games</a> for windows.
The games are precracked & installed with a simple setup program. After many months of work, using a combination of the AutoIt script language, the Smart Install Maker setup program & batch files, I have been able to create powerful installers & uninstallers. Moreover, I have created a simple program with menus to automate the whole install/uninstall process. This program is located at the root of the folder. You don't have to use it, but I recommend it.
Each game is comprised of a small installer file & a data file (located at the Data folder). You don't have to download the whole torrent if you want a specific game. Just download the two files.

Each newer version will have all of the games from the previous version plus more... Ultimately, I hope I will succeed in adding all of the casual games out there. I don't have a seedbox, so this process has to be done gradually. When a version will have enough seeders, I will upload the next version. Those of you who downloaded a previous version, will only have to do a "Force Check" in your torrent software. However, I will replace specific games with better versions when needed.

I accept requests for games to be included in the next version, as long as there is a trial version of them in the big casual games sites (like Big Fish, iWin, Alawar, Iplay, etc.). I then download the trial version, crack it & create the installer.

So, let's start the journey with version 1.0. I want to see how the collection is spread, get comments for improvements & bug fixing, so the first version has games from only two developers & relevantly small. The following is the names of the companies & the game names:
